value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|C'mon, $Nu!
It's time for this year's spring festival!$k$p$EFace|Think about all of the bunny Heroes
we're going to meet... Ooh, I can
barely contain myself! Let's get going!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Aah! Alfonse, look! Over there!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What? Oh, no...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|Now, sweet brother... When you're
dressed like this, you have to try to
talk like a rabbit!$k$p"I'm hoppin' on down to the spring
festival!" is a good start.$k$pYou can build on it from there. Come
on!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|"Talk like a rabbit!?" What does that
even mean? Isn't it enough that I
wear the costume?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|How exciting! It's you from another
world, and me from another world!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Oh, isn't it nice to see ourselves
having such a lovely time?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|That's what you see?$k$pI'm so sorry, other Alfonse...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|Aw, we lost... Back to the burrow for
us!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|You can give me those pouty eyes all
day long, but I'm not going to hop off
the battlefield. Let's go, Sharena.$k$p$Sbs150|
